auth-bypass-basic.name: Basic Auth Bypass
auth-bypass-basic.description: Attempts common authentication bypass techniques like SQLi in login forms and default credentials.
auth-bypass-basic.author: chaos-kitten-core

bola-idor-scanner.name: BOLA/IDOR Scanner
bola-idor-scanner.description: Scans for Broken Object Level Authorization by manipulating resource IDs in API requests.
bola-idor-scanner.author: chaos-kitten-core

business-logic-flaws.name: Business Logic Flaws
business-logic-flaws.description: Tests for common business logic vulnerabilities like negative quantities and race conditions.
business-logic-flaws.author: chaos-kitten-core

command-injection-fuzz.name: Command Injection Fuzzer
command-injection-fuzz.description: Fuzzes input fields with common OS command injection payloads.
command-injection-fuzz.author: chaos-kitten-core

crypto-weakness-check.name: Weak Cryptography Checker
crypto-weakness-check.description: Checks for weak cryptographic algorithms and predictable random number generation.
crypto-weakness-check.author: chaos-kitten-core

csrf-tester.name: CSRF Tester
csrf-tester.description: Tests for Cross-Site Request Forgery vulnerabilities by omitting or manipulating CSRF tokens.
csrf-tester.author: chaos-kitten-core

deserialization-attacks.name: Insecure Deserialization
deserialization-attacks.description: Attempts to exploit insecure deserialization vulnerabilities using common payloads.
deserialization-attacks.author: chaos-kitten-core

file-upload-bypass.name: File Upload Bypass
file-upload-bypass.description: Tests file upload endpoints for extension bypass, content-type spoofing, and malicious payloads.
file-upload-bypass.author: chaos-kitten-core

graphql-introspection.name: GraphQL Introspection & Attacks
graphql-introspection.description: Attempts to enable introspection, find hidden queries, and perform query batching attacks.
graphql-introspection.author: chaos-kitten-core

jwt-manipulation.name: JWT Manipulation
jwt-manipulation.description: Tests JWT implementations for none algorithm, signature stripping, and weak secrets.
jwt-manipulation.author: chaos-kitten-core

mass-assignment-check.name: Mass Assignment Checker
mass-assignment-check.description: Attempts to modify read-only or hidden fields by injecting them into API requests.
mass-assignment-check.author: chaos-kitten-core

nosql-injection.name: NoSQL Injection
nosql-injection.description: Tests for NoSQL injection vulnerabilities using operator manipulation and tautologies.
nosql-injection.author: chaos-kitten-core

path-traversal-fuzz.name: Path Traversal Fuzzer
path-traversal-fuzz.description: Fuzzes file paths and parameters with directory traversal payloads.
path-traversal-fuzz.author: chaos-kitten-core

secret-exposure-scan.name: Secret Exposure Scanner
secret-exposure-scan.description: Scans API responses for exposed secrets, API keys, and sensitive tokens.
secret-exposure-scan.author: chaos-kitten-core

sql-injection-basic.name: Basic SQL Injection
sql-injection-basic.description: Tests for basic SQL injection vulnerabilities using common payloads and error-based techniques.
sql-injection-basic.author: chaos-kitten-core

ssrf-tester.name: SSRF Tester
ssrf-tester.description: Tests for Server-Side Request Forgery by attempting to access internal services and metadata endpoints.
ssrf-tester.author: chaos-kitten-core

xss-reflected.name: Reflected XSS
xss-reflected.description: Tests for reflected Cross-Site Scripting vulnerabilities in API responses.
xss-reflected.author: chaos-kitten-core

xxe-injection.name: XXE Injection
xxe-injection.description: Tests XML endpoints for XML External Entity injection vulnerabilities.
xxe-injection.author: chaos-kitten-core
